# pathway

pathway finds a pathway of observations between two points in a matrix.

## Example

```{r}
set.seed(34)
m <- matrix(rnorm(1000), nrow = 500, ncol = 2)
p1 <- 2L
p2 <- 11L
p <- matrix_pathway(m, p1, p2, k = 1L)
p

plot_pathway(m, p)
```
